Text: I am having issues...whenever i mount the iso and go to run it on the drive theres no like play..it just opens up a folder full of audio and video files
by the way im using power iso and also tried the demonlite that came with it too..im probably just doing it wrong i  would appreciate the help

mount on a virtual drive open up windows media player and select drive or dvd should work

or just burn the iso with imgburn on a blank dvd-r watch on your dvd player
run the video_ts.ifo that should start the player.  media player classic comes with k-lite mega codec pack.
